```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(skimr)
library(readr)
library(janitor)
library(tidyr)

by_vs_am <- mtcars %>% group_by(vs, am)
by_vs <- by_vs_am %>% summarise(n = n())
by_vs
by_vs %>% summarise(n = sum(n))

by_vs %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  summarise(n = sum(n))

by_vs %>%
  ungroup()
by_vs



stocks <- data.frame(
  time = as.Date('2009-01-01') + 0:9,
  X = rnorm(10, 0, 1),
  Y = rnorm(10, 0, 2),
  Z = rnorm(10, 0, 4)
)
stocks
stocksm <- stocks %>% gather(stock, price, -time)
stocksm
stocksm %>% spread(stock, price)
stocksm %>% spread(time, price)
```
